Kneetag is a physical duel where each player has to touch his opponent's knee before his gets touched.
 Standing with their feet about shoulder-width apart, each person faces their partner about a metre away and bends down slightly to place their hands on their knees.
 Each fighter eyes the other eagerly and on “GO” the action begins.
 A round lasts no more than 20-30 seconds. The person who scores the most ‘tags’ upon their partner’s knees wins. Start a new round, or swap partners.
 Capture your fight with your phone to have a fair referee or in case you don't have a third player.
